mapper.sql: logid, custno, acctno, serverid, direction, amt, otheracct, paytype, status, paydate, paytime, summary
mapper.insert: insert into cust_pay_log (logid, custno, acctno, serverid, direction, amt, otheracct, paytype, status, paydate, paytime, summary) values (#{logid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{acctno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serverid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{direction, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amt, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{otheracct, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paydate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert all
into cust_pay_log (logid, custno, acctno, serverid, direction, amt, otheracct, paytype, status, paydate, paytime, summary) values (#{item.logid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.custno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.acctno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.serverid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.direction, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.amt, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.otheracct, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paytype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paydate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paytime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.summary, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from cust_pay_log where 1=1 and logid = #{0}
mapper.update: update cust_pay_log set custno = #{custno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, acctno = #{acctno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, serverid = #{serverid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, direction = #{direction, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amt = #{amt, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, otheracct = #{otheracct, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paytype = #{paytype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paydate = #{paydate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paytime = #{paytime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 and logid = #{logid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cust_pay_log
custno = #{custno, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
acctno = #{acctno, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
serverid = #{serverid, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
direction = #{direction, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amt = #{amt, jdbcType=DOUBLE},
otheracct = #{otheracct, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paytype = #{paytype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paydate = #{paydate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paytime = #{paytime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
summary = #{summary, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1 and logid = #{logid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
